input_text:
Job Title: Senior New Business Representative

Location: Cincinnati, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Description

As a leading provider of annuities, MassMutual Ascend is committed to taking financial futures above and beyond. This means offering innovative products that fit our customers’ unique needs – whether it’s protecting their hard-earned savings, receiving guaranteed income or providing for loved ones. MassMutual Ascend is proud to offer customers a level of strength and stability they can count on for years to come.

The Opportunity

As a Senior New Business Representative, you will interact with internal and external associates to facilitate the issuing of annuity policies. You will work with senior members of your team in a fast-paced environment as well as aiding other areas of the business, mentoring junior level associates. This position has a formal career progression plan in place.

Job Responsibilities

Reviews and processes new applications for annuity policies. Initiates the transfer of funds to fund pending annuity policies. Verifies applications for completeness. Demonstrates working knowledge of regulatory, technical and/or underwriting guidelines to access applications for compliance. Facilitates the suitability review and legal review of applications as necessary. Complies with company and regulatory guidelines/requirements. Refers more complex matters to senior level employees. Responds to routine inquiries from internal and external customers appropriately and timely, which includes telephone calls, emails, faxes, etc. Enters new applications into the appropriate systems in accordance with high quality and quantity standards. Must learn multiple operating systems and use as appropriate. May provide training to lower-level employees. Performs other duties as assigned. 

Minimum Qualifications

High School Diploma or equivalent.

Ideal Qualifications

Minimum of one year of related experience in a similar line of business.

What To Expect

Focused one-on-one meetings with your managerOngoing opportunities for development and learningWorking in a fast-paced environment with available flexible work schedulesA place to grow your career in a culture that inspires, rewards and develops employeesSmall company feel with a focus on meeting customer’s needs today and also well into the future

Why Join Us.

At MassMutual Ascend, our collaborative culture is key to our success. It’s the reason we’re a leading provider of annuities today, and it’s the reason we’ll continue rising to the top tomorrow. A career at MassMutual Ascend means you’ll contribute to our mission of taking financial futures above and beyond – and you’ll be inspired to reach your own goals, too. As a wholly owned subsidiary of MassMutual, MassMutual Ascend continues to be an employer of choice in the Cincinnati, Ohio community.

MassMutual Ascend Life Insurance Company is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer Minority/Female/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Individual with Disability/Protected Veteran. We welcome all persons to apply. Note: Veterans are welcome to apply, regardless of their discharge status.

At MassMutual Ascend we focus on ensuring fair, equitable pay by providing competitive salaries, along with incentive and bonus opportunities for all employees. Your total compensation package includes either a bonus target or in a sales-focused role a Variable Incentive Compensation component. For more information about our extensive benefits offerings please check out our  Total Rewards at a Glance..

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
